changes.change: Multi word search for choose networks. Example: Telenor Denmark.
Filter for ported scenarios available
External phone numbers available to add in Live test.
Available to schedule external phone numbers.
Better options for search SMS test cases. Added RECEIVE status to display both POSITIVE and TEXT_SENDER_CHANGED.
Fixed offset for initial period from for new created scheduler.
Improvements in SMPP connection logging for debug purpose.
Improvements in handling DLR from server.
Added new feature to download network coverage and test scenarios
Redesigned and updated API reference
Improved performance
Improved web responsive design and better support for mobile devices and small screens
Improved performance for selecting and getting available test cases
Client API for creating services improved. Added alternative names for mccmnc and originalMccmnc, e.g. mccmnc and MccMnc will treat equal
Alternative field names for property mccmnc are : "mccMnc", "MccMnc", "Mccmnc"
Alternative field names for property mccmncOriginal are : "mccmncoriginal", "MccmncOriginal", "mccMncOriginal","MccMncOriginal"
Sms test results grid now display ported scenario more visible to user
Fixed MCCMNC networks where exists non digit chars, e.g. 603٠١ or 427٠٢
Better log for SMPP Connection
Handsets with virtual network operators and ported numbers have better availability
Better log for SMPP Connection
Download test results in CSV format available for any filtered test up to 10k rows
Separate view for Manual and API test results
More ported numbers scenarios included
Better log for SMPP Connection
Display current or last active SMPP Session ID for connections
Sms test running smoothly on UI
Extended timeout on submit SMS
Better user experience when live tests running.
Test batch organized by names (without date of start).
Test batch organized by names (without date of start).
Previous tests available on page load.
Clients pages responsive design
New actions
Corrections on networks available
Tests improvement
More help info
Minor fixes
Corrections on handsets
